enGB: Followers of the Path of the Perfect Strike train their speed and precision, seeking to dispatch their opponenents in a single perfect strike.
At 7th level, you gain a bonus to weapon damage equal to your Wisdom modifier against flat-footed enemies.
At 1st level, gain a pool of Insight, a number of points equal to your Wisdom modifier. You may spend insight to quicken your actions.
At 10th level, Lightning Strike and Perfect Strike treat your target as flat-footed.

At 7th level, you can perform a quick strike to inflict devastating damage while focused. Multiply your damage, including any bonuses that would be multiplied on a critical hit, by the number of attacks you may make on a full attack.
At 4th level, you can perform a lightning quick strike with increased range while focused.
At 1st level, you gain the ability to focus. While focused, you add your Wisdom modifier to attack rolls. You start combat focused. Attacking breaks focus.
